# Glyphrun Documentation - Developer Resources for AI Agent Marketplace

This documentation site provides comprehensive developer resources for Glyphrun - The App Store for AI Agents.

## What is Glyphrun?

Glyphrun is a marketplace for Runnable Digital Assets (RDAs) called Glyphs. Think of it as an App Store where every app is an AI capability you can run instantly with USDC micropayments.

## Documentation Sections

### Getting Started
- Understanding Glyphs (Prompts, Agents, Tools)
- Creating an account with Privy
- Funding your wallet with USDC
- Running your first glyph

### Guides

#### For Users
- Discovering glyphs in the marketplace
- Running prompt glyphs with model selection
- Running agent glyphs (workflow automation)
- Running tool glyphs (API proxies)
- Managing your wallet and spending
- Understanding pricing tiers

#### For Creators
- Creating a prompt glyph
- Creating an agent glyph with webhooks
- Creating a tool glyph (API wrapper)
- Defining input/output schemas
- Pricing your glyph
- Publishing and verification process

### Topics

#### Glyph Types
Three types of Runnable Digital Assets:
- **Prompts**: LLM-based text generation with model selection
- **Agents**: Workflow orchestration via webhooks (n8n, CrewAI, etc.)
- **Tools**: API proxies with authentication and transformation

#### Categories
Outcome-based categorization:
- **LAUNCH**: For builders - Token engineering, community management
- **SECURE**: For auditors - Contract audits, identity verification
- **OPTIMIZE**: For traders - DeFi & yield, market alpha

#### Model Tiers (for Prompts)
- **Fast** ($0.02/run): GPT-4o Mini, Claude 3 Haiku, Llama 8B
- **Balanced** ($0.05/run): GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Llama 70B
- **Reasoning** ($0.10/run): o1-preview, Claude 3 Opus, Llama 405B

#### Pricing Models
- Per-run: Fixed price per execution
- Per-token: Based on input/output tokens
- Per-second: Time-based pricing for agents
- Free: No charge (great for building reputation)

#### Payment Flow
All payments use USDC on Base network via xPay:
- Non-custodial - you control your funds
- Instant settlement (~2 seconds)
- Micropayment support
- Global spending allowance

### API Reference

#### Execute a Glyph
`POST /run` - Execute any glyph with inputs and optional model selection

#### List Glyphs
`GET /glyphs` - Browse marketplace with filters (category, type, pricing, etc.)

#### Get Glyph Details
`GET /glyph/{slug}` - Get full glyph details including schema and pricing

#### Create a Glyph
`POST /glyph` - Create a new glyph (requires authentication)

#### Check Wallet Balance
`GET /wallet/balance` - Get your USDC balance and spending status

#### Record Deposit
`POST /wallet/deposit` - Record a USDC deposit to your wallet

## Supported Technologies

### LLM Providers (for Prompts)
- OpenAI: GPT-4o, GPT-4o Mini, o1-preview, o1-mini
- Anthropic: Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Claude 3 Haiku, Claude 3 Opus
- Meta: Llama 3.1 8B, 70B, 405B
- Google: Gemini 1.5 Flash, Gemini 1.5 Pro
- Mistral: Mistral 7B, Mistral Large
- DeepSeek: DeepSeek V3

### Webhook Platforms (for Agents)
- n8n - Workflow automation
- CrewAI - Multi-agent collaboration
- Make.com - Visual automation
- Zapier - No-code workflows
- Custom webhooks

### Authentication (for Tools)
- API Key authentication
- Bearer token authentication
- Basic authentication
- OAuth (coming soon)

### Payment
- Network: Base (Coinbase L2)
- Currency: USDC
- Protocol: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required)

## Use Cases

### For Users
- Analyze smart contracts before investing
- Generate creative token names and branding
- Automate trading strategies
- Monitor wallets and liquidity
- Research market sentiment

### For Creators
- Monetize AI prompts and templates
- Wrap existing APIs with payment gates
- Create automated workflow agents
- Build reputation and earn USDC
- Sell prompt source code

## Documentation Features

- **Multi-language Support**: English and Chinese
- **Interactive Examples**: Live code samples
- **API Reference**: Complete endpoint documentation
- **Code Snippets**: Copy-paste implementations
- **Type Definitions**: TypeScript schemas

## Technical Specifications

- **Platform**: Glyphrun (https://glyphrun.com)
- **Network**: Base Sepolia (testnet), Base Mainnet (production)
- **Currency**: USDC
- **Authentication**: Privy (email, wallet, or social login)
- **Payment**: xPay integration (non-custodial)

## Getting Help

- **Documentation**: https://docs.glyphrun.com
- **Main Platform**: https://glyphrun.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/glyphrun
- **Discord**: https://discord.gg/glyphrun
- **Twitter**: https://x.com/glyphrun

This documentation is built using Nextra, providing:
- Fast, responsive design
- Advanced search capabilities
- Mobile-friendly interface
- Internationalization support
- Developer-focused features
